answers.answer: I have to do it twice.  My Dr's office had me do it around the end of my fiat trimester and end of 2nd trimester because I have pcos, which puts me at a higher risk of gestational diabetes. I did it for both of my pregnancies.  Most times you only do it later,if you are only going to do it once.
Typically the test is given around 24-28 weeks, at least in my case.I am starting my 30the week, and took my test Dec 11.
I agree with Kelli83 between weeks 24-28 I had mine done at 24 weeks.  you should ask If there is a reason why  they are doing it so early.  Good luck.
I had my glucose test at 28 weeks.
They will do it early if they suspect you already have diabetes. But its usually done around 24 to 28 weeks.
Yeah they are doing it way too early. It's usually done between 24-28 weeks .
I had my first one around 8 weeks too. Nothing to worry about they just want to see your base line. My next test is at 29 weeks :)
i had mine around the same time, probrally even sooner hmmm:l ??? ask your doctor lol
Thanks guys! They told me they do it early bc they want to catch gestational diabetes asap.I passed so I have to do another one between 20-25 weeks.

question: So everyone has told me that they are doing my glucose test way to soon. I'm almost 8 weeks along and I go tomorrow for my test. Is there a certain time they do it that is a lot farther along?
title: glucose test?
